wikipedia_page.main: Allan Ramsay (born 1959, Edinburgh) is a painter.  He was the winner of the 1988 John Player Portrait Award, subsequently known as the BP Portrait Award.

response: *Allan Ramsay (poet) or Allan Ramsay the Elder (1686–1758), Scottish poet
*Allan Ramsay (artist) or Allan Ramsay the Younger (1713–1784), Scottish portrait painter
